pageContext.claim: “We've been very -- I mean, I think we've been -- it's been amazing what's been done in a very short period of time on Puerto Rico. ... we've gotten tremendous amounts of food and water, and lots of other things -- supplies -- generally speaking, on the island.”
pageContext.analysis: Not exactly. Puerto Rico Gov. Ricardo Rosselló said the federal government has "complied with our petitions in an expedited manner," but "we need to do a lot more in order for us to get out of the emergency."
